name: Iced Crush Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Iced Crush Recipe: Milk 1 glass Rose water 1 tsp Sugar 4 tbsp Ice 2 cup Whipped cream 1 packet Basil seeds 1 tsp Food color 1 pinch Falooda vermicelli 1 glass Green jelly 1 packet
instructions: Put milk, rose water,sugar and food color in blender and blend well. Now put ice in two glasses then put falooda vermicelli and basil seeds Add milk, cream and jelly then serve.
